text.text_translated:
Sometimes, big rocks in space can hit Earth. These rocks are called PHAs.
Here is another idea to stop a PHA. We can blow it up. This idea sounds like a film story. The film 'Armageddon' in 1998 was about this.
But it is a real plan from NASA. It is called HAMMER. HAMMER means 'Hypervelocity Asteroid Mitigation Mission for Emergency Response'.
HAMMER uses big rockets. These rockets are very heavy, eight tons. NASA can fire these rockets at a PHA. The PHA is coming near Earth.
They hope to hit it to change its way. This moves it away from Earth.
But if the PHA is too close to Earth, this plan will not work.
Then, the rockets will carry very strong bombs. These bombs will blow up the PHA.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Sometimes, big rocks in space can hit Earth. These rocks are called PHAs.
NASA has an idea to keep Earth safe. One idea is to blow up a PHA.
This idea sounds like a movie story. The movie 'Armageddon' in 1998 was about this.
But it is a real plan from NASA. It is called HAMMER.
HAMMER means 'Hypervelocity Asteroid Mitigation Mission for Emergency Response'.
HAMMER uses big rockets. These rockets are very heavy, eight tons.
NASA can fire these rockets at a PHA. The PHA is coming near Earth.
They hope to push it off its path. This moves it away from Earth.
But if the PHA is too close to Earth. This plan will not work then.
Then, the rockets will carry nuclear bombs. These bombs will make the PHA break into many pieces.
